language.entry: Slow and heavy, Miller's scythe can inflict tremendous damage to the foes caught out of guard by its reach. His vest may not look very durable, but the husk body under it offers a solid defence against any assault.

Miller can wreak havoc upon enemies with just a single sweep. However, due to its predictable trajectory, it is best spared for harvesting wounded souls. Moreover, his natural leadership coupled with his husk nature allow him to control the battlefield, either by crippling his opponents or by infusing his companions with power from beyond the stars.
{colour_start|notable}CRIT Effect{colour_end}: ACC +10 (2 rds)

Miller has always known how to take care of a team, be it farmhands or fellow combatants. He provides the necessary care to appease the body and mind, and offers his guidance to others. Even when companions' needs are met, he can reflect on his own to bring out his best.
What seems to be the blessing of the Miller brought us this otherworldly fortune! Sometimes treasures do not exact limbs and bloods to be paid.
A Blaze in the Northern Sky
A comet gleaming with a color out of this space! Luckily it didn't strike the hamlet, but seems like this invited some strange heroes.
A lifetime of pious toil, an eternity of suffering.
The stars blaze with hateful light!
Behold the horror that lurks behind the veil of glimmering starlight!
Witness the wondrous fury of the stars!
"When the famine encroached the farm, I was not entirely sure of what's going on. Or rather, it would be better to say that they were beyond my ken."
"My feet, as lost as myself, couldn't follow any path, but to the observatory, high above our farmstead. He must've jeered at me. Someone whose hands reek of filthy manure."
"I did everything I could do to his likings. The unsightly stones, foremen harassing my dear farmhands... In fact, all of those could not sate that famished, twisted mind."
"On a scorching summer day, there was a freezing blaze in the north of the sky. Everything was stolen from me, except for my naivety."
"A poor miller - thrice a victim. Stripped of all his life, a sad lost soul. Astray in the passage of time, wandering empty furrows left only to pine."
"An indelible scar on the psyche, waiting to be pried open once again."
On Critical Hit: Removes CRIT buff
On Monster Kill: Refresh {colour_start|move}Cooldown{colour_end} on {colour_start|notable}Day Off{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}When the time comes, all will turn to nothingness.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Even in respite, you cannot escape fate.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Let your mind face your terrible fate.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Soon, this shell will turn to ashes.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}This shell is ready to embrace the colour.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Soon, this shell will turn to ashes.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Embrace the colour. Be free from your flesh.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}You cannot feed what cannot feel satiated.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Even in respite, you cannot escape fate.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Let your mind face your terrible fate.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Soon, this shell will turn to ashes.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}This shell is ready to embrace the colour.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Soon, this shell will turn to ashes.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Embrace the colour. Be free from your flesh.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}You cannot feed what cannot feel satiated.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}Flesh and stone alike, all will be ashes.{colour_end}
{colour_start|miller_comet}With strange aeons, even death may die.{colour_end}
